article_node.title: Enterprises Confront the Real Price Tag of AI Deployment
article_node.summary: The article explains that while generative AI model costs are falling, the true expense for enterprises lies in hidden infrastructure, integration, compliance, and ongoing operations, often outweighing token fees. It highlights that self‑hosting or embedded AI can cut costs and that many businesses are adopting AI incrementally to avoid falling behind. The piece also discusses how small and medium‑size firms are using AI to level the playing field, especially in accounting and customer service, and contrasts chatbots with more autonomous AI agents. Finally, a CFO survey shows that strategic, high‑impact AI deployments yield higher ROI, but many firms still face integration and executive‑support challenges.
